trans-unit.source: Contains transformation data that is accumulated when manipulation events occur.
trans-unit.target: 包含操作事件發生時累積的轉換資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta> class contains information about the changes in the position of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>類別包含在操作的位置變更的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] interprets the changes as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 會解譯為變更<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurs on a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, use the properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta> object to transform the object that should be manipulated.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件發生於<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，使用屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>来轉換的物件，應該操作物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs> class provides two properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs>類別提供兩個屬性的型別<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>:<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例套用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中操作的直線動作。

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 操作作業的旋轉 (以度為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: 操作已依照乘數調整大小的量。

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 操作已調整大小的量 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定操作已調整大小的量 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 操作已調整大小的量 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> properties both report a resizing manipulation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>屬性都報告調整大小的操作。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported.
trans-unit.target: 兩者之間的差異是在其報告的值的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>屬性報告中的調整大小操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> property reports the value as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>屬性報告與乘數的值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>為 0.5，操作解譯為減少大小的百分之 50。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>為 2，此操作會解譯為增加了 100%的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定操作的旋轉度數。

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 操作作業的旋轉 (以度為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as rotating around an axis.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>屬性報告操作會解譯為沿著軸旋轉的方式。

trans-unit.source: The axis is usually the point between the two points of contact that initiated the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 軸通常是連絡人的起始處理的兩個點之間的點。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例套用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定操作已依照乘數調整大小的量。

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized.
trans-unit.target: 操作已調整大小的量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> properties both report a resizing manipulation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>屬性都報告調整大小的操作。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported.
trans-unit.target: 兩者之間的差異是在其報告的值的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> property reports the value as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>屬性報告與乘數的值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>為 0.5，操作解譯為減少大小的百分之 50。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>為 2，此操作會解譯為增加了 100%的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>屬性報告中的調整大小操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例套用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the linear motion of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定操作的直線動作。

trans-unit.source: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中操作的直線動作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A> property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as moving horizontally and vertically on the screen.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>屬性報告操作會解譯為移動螢幕上的垂直和水平的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例套用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。
